meanings.sent1: After forgetting some skills, she retrained with a coach.
meanings.sent2: He retrained his dog to follow new commands.
meanings.sent3: The cat retrained the owner to give more treats by meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: The athlete retrained his mind to focus on winning the race.
meanings.sent5: She retrained her memory by practicing daily.

meanings.sent1: The employees retrained to learn the updated procedures.
meanings.sent2: He retrained for the marathon after a break from running.
meanings.sent3: The robot retrained itself to perform tasks more efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The soldier retrained his reflexes to react faster in combat.
meanings.sent5: She retrained her voice to hit higher notes in the song.
